concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 邓普西（姓氏或人名)

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname, most notably associated with James J. Dempsey, an American professional boxer known as 'Jack Dempsey', the world heavyweight champion from 1919 to 1926.
definitions.explanation_cn: 专有名词，通常用作姓氏，最著名的是美国职业拳击手詹姆斯·J·邓普西，绰号‘杰克·邓普西’，1919年至1926年间的世界重量级拳王。
definitions.example_en: Jack Dempsey was famous for his devastating punching power and aggressive fighting style.
definitions.example_cn: 杰克·邓普西以毁灭性的重拳和极具攻击性的打法而闻名。

definitions.explanation_en: A surname of Irish origin, derived from the Gaelic 'Ó Daimhín', meaning 'descendant of Daimhín', a personal name possibly related to 'daimh' (ox or steadfast).
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自爱尔兰语的姓氏，由盖尔语 'Ó Daimhín' 演变而来，意为‘Daimhín 的后裔’，而 Daimhín 可能与 'daimh'（公牛或坚定）相关。
definitions.example_en: Many people with the surname Dempsey live in counties Cork and Galway in Ireland.
definitions.example_cn: 许多姓邓普西的人居住在爱尔兰的科克郡和戈尔韦郡。

comparison.analysis: “Dempsey” 是一个专有姓氏，不具备普通名词的语义功能，因此无法与其他通用词汇（如 'champion' 或 'fighter'）进行直接语义比较。它仅在指代特定人物或家族时具有意义。
